resources.string: Enter your password and click on \"SIGN IN\".

"I’m a high school student. I’m currently 16 years old. I live in Turkey. I dont have many experiences about making an app so I take your reviews really serious. You can write anything about the app (questions, bugs, recommendations, ANR’s, dissatisfactions). I will reply in hours. "
Your note couldn\'t be saved. Please try again.
Your note couldn\'t be deleted. Please try again.
Your note couldn\'t be changed. Please try again.
Your password doesn\'t match. Please try again.
Your password matches. You can sign in.
Your password is about to be saved. Do you confirm this process?
Your extra password hasn\'t been saved.

Would you like to open a secret area in the app which you could enter with another password? If you click “Yes” app is going to open a button, click it. If you click “No” you will never see this message again.
Your password couldn\'t be saved, you cant sign in.
Second password can\'t be same as the first!
Your second password is going to be created. Do you confirm this process?
Second password is saved, extra note area has been created.
Second password isn\'t saved, extra note area couldn\'t be created.
You are in the extra safe note area.
You entered your old password incorrectly.
Your old password can\'t be the same as your new password.
